channel.title: Undercover Fallout
channel.description: Where Truth Meets Fiction in the Digital Age. KC Ryback breaks down the chaos of 2024 - fraud, federal agencies, systematic theft, and the digital fallout. Half analysis, half speculation, fully powered by AI. Field reports from the bunker.
channel.itunes:author: KC Ryback
channel.itunes:summary: Where Truth Meets Fiction in the Digital Age. KC Ryback breaks down the chaos of 2024 - fraud, federal agencies, systematic theft, and the digital fallout. Half analysis, half speculation, fully powered by AI. Field reports from the bunker.

item.title: Episode 003: $75,000, The Doctor, and Systematic Theft
item.description: Seventy-five thousand dollars. February 2024. A home equity loan while high on cocaine, meth, and ecstasy. Then comes the "doctor" - former physician with the purest cocaine. Fifty thousand gone in twenty-four hours. ATM transactions you don't remember. Loan payments bouncing, then drained through Venmo, Zelle, PayPal. This isn't random - it's systematic theft by a coordinated network. And the gangs haven't even shown up yet.
item.itunes:title: $75,000, The Doctor, and Systematic Theft
item.itunes:summary: Seventy-five thousand dollars. February 2024. A home equity loan while high on cocaine, meth, and ecstasy. Then comes the "doctor" - former physician with the purest cocaine. Fifty thousand gone in twenty-four hours. ATM transactions you don't remember. Loan payments bouncing, then drained through Venmo, Zelle, PayPal. This isn't random - it's systematic theft by a coordinated network. And the gangs haven't even shown up yet.

item.title: Episode 002: 75 Days till Digital Quicksand - The Coming Apocalypse
item.description: The countdown begins. KC traces 75 days of descent—from loneliness and relapse to exploitation and extortion. This is the buildup to 2024's chaos: how vulnerability became a weapon, how isolation became a trap, and how it all led to digital quicksand. The house hasn't sold yet. But the walls are closing in.
item.itunes:title: 75 Days till Digital Quicksand - The Coming Apocalypse

item.title: Episode 001: Hacked iPhones, Federal Spies, and a Murder
item.description: Welcome to the bunker. In this inaugural episode, KC breaks down why 2024 feels like a simulation, how the fraudsters won, and why NotebookLM might be the only honest voice left in media.
item.itunes:title: Hacked iPhones, Federal Spies, and a Murder
